rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall featuring Art Deco design elements such as geometric patterns and bold colors, adhering to Vastu principles by orienting the main entrance in a positive direction.
An open-plan living and dining area that seamlessly integrates with the kitchen. Features Art Deco styling, with streamlined furniture and metallic finishes.
A fully equipped, modern kitchen designed as an integral part of the open-plan layout. Vastu compliant by situating near the dining area, promoting harmonious energy flow.
A comfortable guest bedroom with built-in storage and decorative Art Deco details, positioned in a well-ventilated corner of the ground floor to ensure privacy and comfort.

openings.description: Large double door entrance leading into the entrance hall. Designed to align with Vastu principles by being placed on a favorable side.
Multiple windows along the east wall, ensuring natural light and adherence to Vastu for prosperity.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. Art Deco influences can be seen in the ornamental detailing and elegant fixtures. Vastu principles suggest alignment of the bed for optimum energy flow.
A well-lit bedroom designed with modern amenities and classic Art Deco elements to ensure privacy and comfort while following local building norms.
An additional bedroom featuring a cozy ambience with decorative mouldings and comfortable furnishings. Designed with Vastu in mind by ensuring proper orientation of the room.

A dedicated private gym area on the first floor with state-of-the-art equipment and flooring designed for high-impact activities. The placement follows local building norms and Vastu recommendations for personal growth and energy balance.
Modern bathroom space accompanying the private gym area, ensuring functionality and adherence to design standards.

openings.description: A balcony door offering a view of the surrounding landscape. Placed according to Vastu guidelines to enhance relaxation and mental well-being.
South facing windows that provide ample natural light, enhancing energy flow throughout the bedrooms.
